metadata.title: CVE-2017-14749 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: JerryScript 1.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(jmem_heap_alloc_block_internal heap memory corruption) or possibly executearbitrary code via a crafted .js file, because unrecognized \ characterscause incorrect 0x00 characters in bytecode.literal data.

criterions.comment: iotjs package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
